snippet: A man who killed a constable and a passerby near Texas A&M University campus posted names of snipers and pictures of assault rifles on his Facebook page.
abstract: Thomas Caffall, man who killed a constable and a passerby near Texas A&M University campus before being shot to death by police, posted names of snipers and pictures of assault rifles on his Facebook page.
lead_paragraph: A man who killed a constable and a passerby near Texas A&M University campus posted names of snipers and pictures of assault rifles on his Facebook page.

headline.seo: Texas A&M Gunman Wrote That Snipers Were ‘Inspirational’
headline.main: Gunman in Texas Wrote of ‘Inspirational’ Snipers and of Buying a Gun
headline.print_headline: Gunman in Texas Wrote of ‘Inspirational’ Snipers and of Buying a Gun
